LanguageData.MMTank_Drumcan.label: Drum can
LanguageData.MMTank_Drumcan.description: There was a drum can in a town called Descles.\nA drum can of veteran that has been pushed, hated and loved by countless people. One day he became a Tsukumogami and wandered around looking for someone to push him.\nHe can carry a large amount of luggage with mysterious power.
LanguageData.MMTank_Drumcan.tools.0.label: Body attack
